MemberSignature.Value: public static void CaptureStart (IntPtr device);
.method public static hidebysig pinvokeimpl ("openal32.dll" as "alcCaptureStart" cdecl)void CaptureStart(native int device) cil managed

Docs.param: a pointer to a capture device.
Docs.summary: This function begins a capture operation.
Docs.remarks: alcCaptureStart will begin recording to an internal ring buffer of the size specified when opening the capture device. The application can then retrieve the number of samples currently available using the ALC_CAPTURE_SAPMPLES token with alcGetIntegerv. When the application determines that enough samples are available for processing, then it can obtain them with a call to alcCaptureSamples.

MemberSignature.Value: public static string GetString (IntPtr device, Xamarin.iOS.dll=OpenTK.Audio.OpenAL.AlcGetString param);
.method public static hidebysig string GetString(native int device, valuetype Xamarin.iOS.dll=OpenTK.Audio.OpenAL.AlcGetString param) cil managed

Docs.param: a pointer to the device to be queried.
an attribute to be retrieved: ALC_DEFAULT_DEVICE_SPECIFIER, ALC_CAPTURE_DEFAULT_DEVICE_SPECIFIER, ALC_DEVICE_SPECIFIER, ALC_CAPTURE_DEVICE_SPECIFIER, ALC_EXTENSIONS
Docs.summary: This function returns pointers to strings related to the context.
Docs.returns: A string containing the name of the Device.
Docs.remarks: ALC_DEFAULT_DEVICE_SPECIFIER will return the name of the default output device. ALC_CAPTURE_DEFAULT_DEVICE_SPECIFIER will return the name of the default capture device. ALC_DEVICE_SPECIFIER will return the name of the specified output device if a pointer is supplied, or will return a list of all available devices if a NULL device pointer is supplied. A list is a pointer to a series of strings separated by NULL characters, with the list terminated by two NULL characters. See Enumeration Extension for more details. ALC_CAPTURE_DEVICE_SPECIFIER will return the name of the specified capture device if a pointer is supplied, or will return a list of all available devices if a NULL device pointer is supplied. ALC_EXTENSIONS returns a list of available context extensions, with each extension separated by a space and the list terminated by a NULL character.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Collections.Generic.IList<string> GetString (IntPtr device, Xamarin.iOS.dll=OpenTK.Audio.OpenAL.AlcGetStringList param);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Collections.Generic.IList`1<string> GetString(native int device, valuetype Xamarin.iOS.dll=OpenTK.Audio.OpenAL.AlcGetStringList param) cil managed

Docs.param: a pointer to the device to be queried.
an attribute to be retrieved: ALC_DEVICE_SPECIFIER, ALC_CAPTURE_DEVICE_SPECIFIER, ALC_ALL_DEVICES_SPECIFIER
Docs.summary: This function returns a List of strings related to the context.
Docs.returns: A List of strings containing the names of the Devices.
Docs.remarks: ALC_DEVICE_SPECIFIER will return the name of the specified output device if a pointer is supplied, or will return a list of all available devices if a NULL device pointer is supplied. A list is a pointer to a series of strings separated by NULL characters, with the list terminated by two NULL characters. See Enumeration Extension for more details. ALC_CAPTURE_DEVICE_SPECIFIER will return the name of the specified capture device if a pointer is supplied, or will return a list of all available devices if a NULL device pointer is supplied. ALC_EXTENSIONS returns a list of available context extensions, with each extension separated by a space and the list terminated by a NULL character.
